body: @s1monw I still want to add a unit test for the new NodeConnectionsService but I think we can start the review process and get feedback..
@s1monw I rebased, added a unit test and addressed the comments. I think it's ready for review..

@s1monw thanks for the feedback. I pushed some more commits and merged from master. I think the main discussion still open is regarding listeners. Sadly github folded it away - but please check my answer [here](https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/pull/16872#discussion_r55187553)
